Shoves Lukich toward the stairwell while simultaneously firing back through the kicked-in door and reloading quickly.
Shoots Chi Chi in the face rapidly after Chi Chi shoots Jackson, showing quick reflexes and marksmanship.
Continues to fire a hail of bullets through the doorway and walls, effectively neutralizing Chi Chi.
Despite being hit in the ribs, tries to fire back but is empty; immediately bolts for the stairwell to reload while under fire.
Leaps off the roof onto a moving elevated train to escape gunfire, catches a railing despite momentum nearly carrying him off, and successfully evades pursuers.
Bullets miss his targets when he fires at Salvano and Zagon, who take cover and continue to pursue him.
Cries quietly looking at Jackson's photo, apologizes sincerely to her.
Shows respect and tenderness toward Jackson by noticing personal items and photos in her apartment.
Expresses scorn toward the senator and his policies, indicating frustration but not personal malice.
Applies a makeshift bandage to his bloody ribs despite being in real pain and exhausted.
Attempts to study complex and disturbing documents quickly despite physical weakness.
Shows emotional vulnerability by crying and expressing regret aloud.
Circles important upcoming dates on a calendar, indicating planning and organization.
Scoops up aide's papers and stands wobbly but determined, showing resolve despite physical weakness.
Expresses scorn toward the senator's plans, indicating critical thinking and awareness.
Shows visible relief and a small smile upon hearing Jackson is alive despite the danger she faced.
Refers to Jackson as 'that broad' and notes she didn't trust him, indicating a somewhat brusque or dismissive attitude.
Despite being severely injured and barely able to walk, Nico manages to reach Branca's safe house, showing determination and resilience.

Upon hearing that Jackson was shot but survived due to wearing a vest, Nico shows a moment of emotional vulnerability but also a slight smile, indicating some emotional control and situational awareness.
Nico's statement 'That broad didn't trust me' suggests some self-awareness and reflection on interpersonal dynamics, which can be a subtle indicator of competence in understanding relationships.
Reaches for Sara despite pain, allowing her to comfort him.
Shows grim expression understanding the threat to his family.
Remains composed and aware despite being injured and in pain; understands the implication of the photograph showing his family targeted.
Reaches for Sara despite pain, showing emotional connection but physical limitation.
Nuzzles Julian tenderly, comments on the innocence of babies.
Refuses to go to Federico despite pleas from Sara and Rosa, showing emotional pain but firm resistance.
Refuses to go to Federico despite pressure, showing strong personal conviction and emotional control.
Remains silent and non-responsive when urged by Rosa, indicating possible hesitation or avoidance.
Expresses pain and emotional struggle openly, showing self-awareness but also vulnerability.
Holds his wife tight, showing physical affection and comfort.
Walks with an old inmate, engaging in measured conversation despite tension.
Wears a suit and tie, all business, showing professionalism and readiness.
Walks confidently through prison corridors escorted by guards, maintaining composure in a tense environment.
Engages in a tense, measured interaction with an older inmate, showing awareness and careful appraisal.
Holds his family close, showing emotional support and connection.
Admits to having hated his uncle and everything he stood for, then acknowledges painful personal growth and similarity between them.
Pauses and glances away, showing vulnerability and sincerity in his admission.
Speaks plainly and honestly about his feelings despite it being very painful for him.
Recognizes and admits the painful truth that his former beliefs and his uncle's position are not so different.
Pauses and glances away, showing emotional struggle but maintains composure to continue the conversation.
Sincerely tells Mr. Larusso he hopes he will be well.
Squeezes Sara's hand reassuringly as she clings to him worriedly.
Nods to confirm memorization of a critical address and shows understanding without needing the note.
Responds sincerely and respectfully to Federico Larusso, indicating social awareness and emotional intelligence.
Receives a subtle warning from Sara and acknowledges it with a reassuring squeeze of her hand, showing situational awareness and calm under pressure.
Regards his uncle with affection.
Embraces his uncle by both shoulders and thanks him warmly.
Tells his uncle 'It's not your business.'
Carries the architect's drawings and floor plans securely in a briefcase, indicating preparedness.
Refuses help from his uncle Branca, asserting control over the situation.
Uses a high-tech night telescope to surveil a target location, demonstrating skill and resourcefulness.
Greets old adversary Fox with a friendly, respectful tone despite the threat.
Complies calmly with Fox's demand to drop his gun, showing trust and non-aggression.
Engages in light, somewhat cordial banter about Fox's appearance and tailor.
Plans a violent ambush (mine on the roof) despite friendly tone.
Uses a high-tech night telescope and takes notes on a pocket pad, indicating careful reconnaissance and planning.
Has a plan involving a remote-triggered mine on the roof, showing strategic thinking and anticipation of security measures.
Complies with Fox's demand to drop his gun gently into the briefcase, showing calmness and control under threat.
Turns slowly when threatened at gunpoint, demonstrating cautiousness and presence of mind.
Freezes immediately when a gun is clicked off behind him, showing momentary surprise or vulnerability.
Engages in calm, measured dialogue with Fox despite the threat, indicating confidence and interpersonal skill.
Engages in tense, sarcastic banter with Fox, showing distrust and skepticism.
Maintains composure and follows Fox's instructions without complaint.
Engages in a tense conversation with Fox, showing awareness of criminal operations and connections (e.g., questioning Zagon's activities and the drug funneling).
Maintains calm body language (walking with hands behind head) despite having a gun leveled at his back, indicating confidence and control.
Questions Fox's statements critically and sarcastically, demonstrating intelligence and skepticism.
Follows Fox's instructions to stay five paces ahead and cross to the garage, showing tactical awareness and discipline.
Admits he was 'too dumb to crack' the wiretap code and reflects honestly on his mistake.
Engages in a somewhat cynical exchange with Fox about killing senators and empire, showing a sardonic attitude.
Questions Fox's offer with skepticism ('Doing what -- processing heroin?'), showing distrust and guardedness.
Admits he was too dumb to crack the wiretap code and failed to recognize Zagon's voice despite being involved.
Understands the situation clearly after the fact and articulates the implications about killing senators.
Questions Fox's offer and motives, showing skepticism and critical thinking.
Confronts Fox about war crimes and CIA impunity, expressing moral outrage and demanding accountability.
Uses harsh language and aggressive stance toward Fox, escalating tension despite Fox's visible threat.
Confronts Fox directly despite the threat of a gun, speaks passionately and knowledgeably about war crimes and accountability, showing moral clarity and courage.
Is too tired and disgusted to care about the gun Fox is carrying, which could be seen as a lack of caution or prudence in a dangerous situation.
Plays it cool to avoid alarming innocent bystanders despite a tense, armed confrontation.
Thanks Fox for help, showing appreciation.
Backs away cautiously, ready for anything, showing self-preservation but no aggression.
Plays it cool and does not alarm innocent bystanders despite a threatening situation with armed men approaching.
Backs away cautiously, ready for anything, showing situational awareness and preparedness.
Does not make a rash move to attack or run, indicating measured judgment under pressure.
Snatches Fox's .45 from the ground and uses it to defend himself and others under heavy gunfire.
Kills an agent who is threatening him and others in a violent shootout.
Snatches a gun from the dying Fox amidst a hail of machine gun fire and immediately takes cover behind a concrete column.
Pops out from behind cover and accurately shoots an advancing agent in the head, neutralizing the threat.
Springs from cover firing and attempts to escape down the garage ramp despite heavy enemy fire.
Tears a valet from a car and leaps in to use the vehicle to continue his escape.
Tears a valet from behind the wheel and commandeers the car without consent.
Drives recklessly and aggressively, using the car as a weapon to kill Salvano.
Charges at Zagon and slams him into a concrete column with great force.
Leaps into a moving car quickly and takes control under fire.
Drives blind after windshield is blown out and tires explode, maintaining control.
Uses reverse gear skillfully to ram and incapacitate an opponent.
Immediately charges and physically overpowers an armed adversary after exiting the car.
Charges at Zagon and physically subdues him despite personal injury.
Pursues Zagon relentlessly to prevent his escape, risking own safety.
Charges at Zagon and slams him with incredible force into a concrete column.
Dives for Zagon and gets his neck in a grip that could snap it, showing physical skill and tactical aggression.
Despite being slashed and wounded, gets to his feet bleeding and immediately pursues Zagon, showing resilience and determination.
Leaps into a half-destroyed car with flat tires and a blown-out windshield, then drives it in reverse at high speed to chase Zagon, demonstrating quick thinking and adaptability under pressure.
Cuts off Zagon's car in reverse, crashing into it to stop him.
Takes off after Zagon on foot despite danger.
Cuts off Zagon's car in reverse despite his own car being wrecked, causing Zagon's car to crash into the fountain retaining wall.
Immediately pursues Zagon on foot after the crash, showing determination and quick reaction.
Runs into four armed agents unexpectedly and is quickly stopped and captured.
Ends up tied and restrained in a basement room, indicating failure to avoid capture or anticipate ambush.
Asks Zagon how he plans to handle the senator, showing engagement and composure under duress.
Endures physical abuse without retaliating or showing hatred, maintaining composure despite torture.
Asks Zagon how he plans to handle the senator, showing awareness and engagement in the situation despite being restrained.
Allows himself to be violently beaten and restrained without visible resistance or counteraction.
Meets Zagon's eyes with defiance despite being beaten and gagged.
Struggles violently against agents holding him down, showing resistance and fighting spirit.
Springs to life suddenly, disarms and attacks Zagon to save himself.
Takes a beating but remains conscious and defiant, showing mental resilience.
Reacts instantly and violently to the injection, attempting to free himself despite being restrained.
Springs to life suddenly, surprising his captors and overpowering Zagon despite being weakened and restrained.
Sidesteps a gunshot at the last moment and grabs the attacker's wrist, demonstrating quick reflexes and situational awareness.
Defends himself and others aggressively against multiple attackers, showing determination and protective instincts.
Uses brutal physical violence to incapacitate enemies, including breaking an opponent's elbow and causing severe injury.
Sidesteps a shotgun blast, disarms and incapacitates two armed agents in quick succession, then kills a third attacker with a shotgun blast.
Quickly frees his hands by slashing tape with a scalpel and removes a choke cable from his neck under pressure.
Engages in close combat with a dangerous opponent despite being weakened by drugs, successfully traps and breaks the opponent's knife-wielding arm.
Shows signs of weakening and internal struggle due to drug effects but continues to fight effectively.
Inflicts severe physical harm on Zagon, breaking his arm and neck in a violent manner.
Collapses delirious and is supported by Jackson and others who show concern for him.
Snaps Zagon's elbow joint and then breaks his neck to subdue him, demonstrating physical control and decisiveness in a violent confrontation.
Emerges delirious and collapses shortly after the fight, showing physical and mental exhaustion that limits his immediate effectiveness.
Responds respectfully to Senator Harrison and Judge Alspaugh, shows readiness to share his story despite physical condition.
Responds confidently to Judge Alspaugh's question about his health, indicating readiness to testify despite his condition.
Maintains composure and focus while telling his story in a formal deposition setting with officials and media present.
